CAPTION FIG1.png: 'Figure 1: A sister-survivor working on a traditional woolen shawl. The text reads, “Although it looks easy, it [**shawl**] requires hard work. With effort, it gets easier over time"\n\n'
CAPTION FIG2.png: 'Figure 2: Sisters sitting together and spinning wool. The translated text reads “Fer Nepali women, in cases of unemployment, this could be an employment opportunity”\n\n'
